statement.title: # Content
statement.content: Given an interger $N$, you are supposed to tell me the last digit of $S=1^1+2^2+....+N^N$.

statement.title: # Standard Input
statement.content: The first line contains an integer $N$ ($1 \leq N \leq 10^{100000}$).

statement.title: # Standard Output
statement.content: Output a digit meaning the last digit of $S=1^1+2^2+....+N^N$.

statement.title: # Samples
statement.content:
Input Output
32
158
